metadata.synopsis: The party reacts to solving the mind flayer "mind puzzle" in the Colony Vault, near the Necro-Lab. Solving the puzzle unlocks a door where you can find the rewards.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Solve the Colony Vault puzzle. Let's be honest, you're not going to. But if you want to: "goto 737 13 -110" and interact with the mind flayer console.- Alternatively, just use "oe COL_Vault_AutoSolve" and the puzzle will solve itself and teleport you into place.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That should do it. Time to see what's back there.
